fabric.common

Class ClassRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • fabric.common.ClassRef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FastSerializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassRef.FabricClassRef

    public abstract class ClassRef
extends java.lang.Object
implements FastSerializable
    Encapsulates a reference to a class object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ClassRef.FabricClassRef
      ClassRef for classes stored in Fabric.

    • Method Detail

      • makeRef

        public static ClassRef makeRef(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Factory method.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class being referenced. If it's a Fabric class, this must be the interface corresponding to the Fabric type, and not the _Proxy or _Impl classes.

      • toClass

        public abstract java.lang.Class<?> toClass()
        Returns:
        the Java Class object for this class. For Fabric classes (i.e., ones that extend fabric.lang.Object), this is the Class object for the interface corresponding to the Fabric type, and not the _Proxy or _Impl classes.

      • toImplClass

        public java.lang.Class<? extends Object._Impl> toImplClass()
        Returns:
        the _Impl class object for this (assumed to be) Fabric class.
        Throws:
        InternalError - if no _Impl class is found (usually because this is either a Java class or a Fabric interface)

      • toProxyClass

        public java.lang.Class<? extends Object._Proxy> toProxyClass()
        Returns:
        the _Proxy class object for this (assumed to be) Fabric class.
        Throws:
        InternalError - if no _Proxy class is found (usually because this is not a Fabric class)
